name: Def Jam Fight For New York: The Takeover
name_original: Def Jam Fight For New York: The Takeover
description:
Take your fight to the streets and experience the ultimate hip hop fighting game anywhere you go with Def Jam® Fight For NY™: The Takeover. Win fights to gain respect as you rise through the ranks, and then pick your crew to do battle in an all-out territory war to control New York's underground. Featuring a new Story mode, new moves and venues, head-to-head wireless gameplay, and more than 40 of hip hop's hottest names, including Busta Rhymes, Ludacris, Method Man, Snoop Dogg, and Xzibit, Def Jam® Fight For New York™: The Takeover is this year's must-have title for the PSP®.



This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.
